title: Understanding Autism Characteristics
text: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) is characterized by specific patterns of behavior and communication. Think about what these might be.

title: Social Communication Deficits
text: One of the key characteristics of autism involves challenges in social communication. Consider what these challenges might look like.

title: Repetitive Patterns
text: Another characteristic of autism is the presence of repetitive patterns. What might these patterns involve?

hintAnswer: persistent deficits in social communication and social interaction across contexts; restricted, repetitive patterns of behavior, interests, or activities
title: Identifying Characteristics
text: Select the two main characteristics of autism from the options provided.
choices: persistent deficits in social communication and social interaction across contexts; restricted, repetitive patterns of behavior, interests, or activities
lack of facial expressions; lack of interest in peers
persistent deficits in social communication and social interaction across contexts;flapping of hands
restricted, repetitive patterns of behavior, interests, or activities; atypical responses to sensory input
